title: Light
title-note: British periodical on spiritualism and psychic phenomena
additional-note: This is a British publication.  Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. Some issues from 1930 note that the periodical is entered as second class matter at the Post Office in Boston, implying that issues were regularly sent to the United States.
